meta_title: HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct  Growth - Groww
meta_desc: HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct  Growth is Small Cap Equity mutual fund with risk-reward rating of 2/10. It has track record of 11 years, with three year return of 25.92. Risk is Very High
scheme_name: HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct  Growth
exit_load: Exit load of 1% if redeemed within 1 year
description: The scheme seeks to provide long-term capital appreciation /income by investing predominantly in Small-Cap companies.

analysis.analysis_desc: 1Y and 5Y annualised returns lower than category average

amc_info.name: HDFC Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: "HDFC House", 2nd Floor, H. T. Parekh Marg, 165-166, BackbayReclamation, Churchgate Mumbai 400020
amc_info.description: HDFC Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 30/06/2000 and its managing total assets of ₹2,70,046 Cr. Its ranked at 2 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2017.
amc_info.more_description:
It is the largest asset management company (AMC) in the country (as per average assets under management as on 31 December 2018 of Rs. 339,178 Crores

Launched on the 10th of December, 1999, HDFC Asset Management Company Ltd. is among the most popular fund houses in India. The company offers an extensive range of mutual funds and is home to some of the most trustworthy fund managers who ensure that your hard-earned money is invested in the right schemes. Whether you seek growth funds, income funds, or even retirement funds, HDFC AMC Ltd. has it all.

HDFC Mutual Fund has left no stone unturned to cater to investors from all walks of life. Be it any financial goal – long-term, short-term, retirement, tax-saving and so on – HDFC has that plan for you.

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.

fund_manager_details.education: Mr. Setalvad is a B. Sc and MBA from University of North Carolina.
fund_manager_details.experience: Prior to joining HDFC AMC he has worked with New Vernon Advisory Services Ltd., HDFC AMC and ING Barings N.V.
